mapper.sql: id, order_id, test_id, student_id, student_name, test_time, test_duration, plate_number, coach_id, coach_name, test_money, coach_money, coach_separate_status, coach_separate_remark, coach_separate_order_no, coach_separate_payment_no, agent_1_money, agent_1_separate_status, agent_1_separate_remark, agent_1_separate_order_no, agent_1_separate_payment_no, agent_2_money, agent_2_separate_status, agent_2_separate_remark, agent_2_separate_order_no, agent_2_separate_payment_no, agent_3_money, agent_3_separate_status, agent_3_separate_remark, agent_3_separate_order_no, agent_3_separate_payment_no, operator_money, operator_separate_status, operator_separate_remark, operator_separate_order_no, operator_separate_payment_no, create_time,agent_1_id,agent_2_id,agent_3_id
mapper.insert:
insert into tab_separate_account
id,
order_id,
test_id,
student_id,
student_name,
test_time,
test_duration,
plate_number,
coach_id,
coach_name,
test_money,
coach_money,
coach_separate_status,
coach_separate_remark,
coach_separate_order_no,
coach_separate_payment_no,
agent_1_money,
agent_1_separate_status,
agent_1_separate_remark,
agent_1_separate_order_no,
agent_1_separate_payment_no,
agent_2_money,
agent_2_separate_status,
agent_2_separate_remark,
agent_2_separate_order_no,
agent_2_separate_payment_no,
agent_3_money,
agent_3_separate_status,
agent_3_separate_remark,
agent_3_separate_order_no,
agent_3_separate_payment_no,
operator_money,
operator_separate_status,
operator_separate_remark,
operator_separate_order_no,
operator_separate_payment_no,
create_time,
agent_1_id,
agent_2_id,
agent_3_id,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{testId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{testTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{testDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{plateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{coachId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{coachName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{testMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{coachMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

#{coachSeparateRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{coachSeparateOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{coachSeparatePaymentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{agent1Money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

#{agent1SeparateRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{agent1SeparatePaymentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM tab_separate_account where coach_id=#{_parameter} and coach_separate_status=1

select count(*) from tab_separate_account
and coach_id IN
#{id}
and create_time >=DATE_FORMAT( #{starDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s')
and create_time <= DATE_FORMAT( #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s')
SELECT count(*) FROM tab_separate_account where (agent_1_id=#{_parameter} or agent_2_id=#{_parameter} or agent_3_id=#{_parameter})and coach_separate_status=1

SELECT test_time,plate_number,test_duration,case when agent_1_id=#{agent_id} then agent_1_money when agent_2_id=#{agent_id} then agent_2_money when agent_3_id=#{agent_id} then agent_3_money end as agent_money FROM tab_separate_account where (agent_1_id=#{agent_id} or agent_2_id=#{agent_id} or agent_3_id=#{agent_id}) and coach_separate_status=1 order by id desc limit #{startNum},#{limitNum}

SELECT SUM(coach_money) AS dayRevenue FROM tab_separate_account
coach_id = #{coach_id} and coach_separate_status=1 and to_days(test_time) = to_days(now())

SELECT SUM(coach_money) AS sevenRevenue FROM tab_separate_account
coach_id = #{coach_id} and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= date(test_time)

SELECT SUM(coach_money) AS monthRevenue FROM tab_separate_account
coach_id = #{coach_id} and coach_separate_status=1 and DATE_FORMAT( test_time,'%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m')

SELECT SUM(coach_money) AS totalRevenue FROM tab_separate_account
coach_id = #{coach_id} and coach_separate_status=1

select t.agent_1_money,t.agent_2_money,t.agent_3_money,t2.level from tab_separate_account t left join tab_coach t1 on t.coach_id=t1.coach_id left join tab_agent t2 on t2.agent_id=t1.agent_id
and t.coach_id IN
#{id}
and coach_separate_status=1 and DATE_FORMAT( test_time,'%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m')

select t.agent_1_money,t.agent_2_money,t.agent_3_money,t2.level from tab_separate_account t left join tab_coach t1 on t.coach_id=t1.coach_id left join tab_agent t2 on t2.agent_id=t1.agent_id
and t.coach_id IN
#{id}
and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= date(test_time)

select t.agent_1_money,t.agent_2_money,t.agent_3_money,t2.level from tab_separate_account t left join tab_coach t1 on t.coach_id=t1.coach_id left join tab_agent t2 on t2.agent_id=t1.agent_id
and t.coach_id IN
#{id}
and coach_separate_status=1 and to_days(test_time) = to_days(now())

SELECT
COALESCE(SUM(agent_1_money),0) AS agent1Money
COALESCE(SUM(agent_2_money),0)AS agent2Money
COALESCE(SUM(agent_3_money),0)AS agent3Money
FROM tab_separate_account
agent_1_id = #{agentId} and agent_1_separate_status=1
agent_2_id = #{agentId} and agent_2_separate_status=1
agent_3_id = #{agentId} and agent_3_separate_status=1

SELECT coach_id AS coachId,coach_name AS coachName,SUM(coach_money) AS coachMoney,create_time AS createTime,order_id AS orderId FROM tab_separate_account where agent_1_id=#{agentId} and coach_separate_status=1 GROUP BY coach_id ORDER BY coachMoney DESC LIMIT 0 ,10

SELECT coach_id AS coachId,coach_name AS coachName,SUM(coach_money) AS coachMoney,create_time AS createTime,order_id AS orderId FROM tab_separate_account where agent_2_id=#{agentId} and coach_separate_status=1 GROUP BY coach_id ORDER BY coachMoney DESC LIMIT 0 ,10

SELECT coach_id AS coachId,coach_name AS coachName,SUM(coach_money) AS coachMoney,create_time AS createTime,order_id AS orderId FROM tab_separate_account where agent_3_id=#{agentId} and coach_separate_status=1 GROUP BY coach_id ORDER BY coachMoney DESC LIMIT 0 ,10

SELECT coach_id,coach_name,SUM(coach_money) AS coachMoney,test_time AS testTime,order_id AS orderId FROM tab_separate_account
coach_separate_status=1
and to_days(test_time) = to_days(now())
and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= date(test_time)
and DATE_FORMAT( test_time,'%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m')
GROUP BY coach_id ORDER BY coachMoney DESC LIMIT 0 ,10

SELECT coach_id,coach_name,SUM(coach_money) AS coachMoney,create_time AS createTime,order_id AS orderId FROM tab_separate_account where coach_separate_status=1 GROUP BY coach_id ORDER BY coachMoney DESC LIMIT 0 ,10
